archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0053
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want orders with urgent delivery to be fulfilled immediately after succesful payment, so the customer can get their order delivered quickly

properties.value: OOTB, another delivery option. BTW: Is Uber still considered? Is there an integration with Uber? Uber is most likely not expected. In general urgent delivery is considered.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
